I wasn't able to reproduce this in 3.2 so I had a look at the code.

In 3.1 there used to be a number of paths that disposed part sash containers within the perspective helper.  In 3.2, most of those paths were modified to use setActive(false) instead, which cleaned up references but did not dispose the part sash containers (and so the parent composite isn't being set to null).

I think it's safe to say it's fixed ... and we'll re-open it or create a new bug if it crops up again.

PW
